column1: #Text=Taxis have two inspections a year, they take the car apart, 2.
#Text=They have wide view camera's 3, The riders have a bill of rights, 4. you are insured for 2 million dollars when you ride in a cab,,, Uber no insurance at all,,, none,,, 5.

#Text=Cabbies are regulated by the licensing commission, they cannot even smoke in the car at all, if you smell smoke call the commission and complain , Ohh Im sorry how many saftey features were you looking for as I have 83 more,,, the by-laws,,, that Uber ignores,
